input_assets.product_lock_rule: CRITICAL: Depict ONLY the exact product described in the provided data. Do NOT change the model/category. Do NOT add brand logos. Keep the product as the hero element.
input_assets.product: Bee Venom Bswell (frasco de vidrio 120g, tratamiento cosmético con veneno de abeja purificado)
input_assets.additional_assets: No additional assets provided; generate background/props only (non-branded).

prompts.prompt: Create a high-conversion 1:1 ecommerce ad thumbnail for the product 'Bee Venom Bswell' only: a 120g glass jar cosmetic treatment. Photorealistic studio product shot, hero product centered and largest, ultra-sharp label area but with no added logos or new branding. Luxury-inspired look on a budget: clean white-to-warm-cream gradient background with subtle golden honey glow, soft shadow under the jar, a few abstract honey droplets/bokeh (non-realistic, non-food) to suggest premium skincare. Add a small elegant price-contrast visual element: a faint, generic 'premium serum' silhouette bottle in the far background blurred and desaturated (no logos, no readable text), to imply expensive alternatives without naming brands. High contrast, crisp edges, premium lighting, minimal clutter. Leave clear negative space top-left for headline and bottom corners for badges.

style.badge: rounded sticker, solid color, high contrast
rounded sticker, slightly smaller than 'Envío gratis', high contrast

composition_rules.focus: Product jar must be the largest element (occupy ~55–65% of frame height), centered; sharpest point on the jar front; background elements must be blurred and secondary.
composition_rules.text_legibility: Maintain clean negative space behind text; ensure WCAG-like contrast; avoid placing text over highlights; keep all text inside 10% safe margins.

prompts.negative_prompt: Do not change the product type or container; no pump bottles, no tubes. No brand logos added, no new labels, no readable fake brand names. No watermarks. No copyrighted characters. No recognizable faces or people. No medical claims, no 'before/after' split images. No cluttered backgrounds, no low contrast, no excessive props, no busy patterns. No currency symbols or exact competitor prices. Avoid bees/insects photorealistic close-ups.

prompts.prompt: Design a bold, high-contrast ecommerce thumbnail featuring ONLY the Bee Venom Bswell 120g glass jar as the hero. Background: split diagonal from matte black (top-right) to warm champagne gold (bottom-left) to signal premium. Product placed slightly right of center, large and sharp with glossy highlights. Add a soft golden rim light around the jar for premium feel. Reserve top-left for headline and bottom badges.

prompts.negative_prompt: No additional products, no competitor packaging, no readable brand names, no price numbers, no currency symbols. No faces, hands, or models. prompts.prompt: Create a high-conversion ecommerce square thumbnail (1080x1080) for a skincare product. Depict ONLY the product 'Bee Venom Bswell' as a clear glass jar (120g) with a minimal label that reads exactly 'Bee Venom Bswell' (no brand logo), with a metallic gold lid. Hero product centered and largest, ultra-sharp, glossy highlights, realistic glass reflections. Background: clean warm ivory-to-honey gradient with subtle bokeh. Add three small ingredient icons to the right side (not competing with product): a water droplet icon for hyaluronic acid, a collagen fiber swirl icon, and a propolis/honeycomb icon; keep them simple, generic, and unbranded. Add a soft light beam behind the jar to suggest glow. Overall look: premium, minimal, high contrast, strong depth, crisp edges, studio lighting, no clutter.

composition_rules.focus: Product jar must be the largest and sharpest element; ingredient icons secondary and smaller; no other objects competing for attention.
composition_rules.text_legibility: All text must be high-contrast, inside 10% safe margins, not overlapping key product label; use solid/boxed text treatments to remain readable on mobile.

prompts.negative_prompt: Do not add any other products, boxes, droppers, or extra jars. No brand logos, no watermarks, no QR codes, no seals, no fake certifications, no medical claims, no before/after skin photos, no faces or people, no hands, no bees or insects, no copyrighted characters. No messy bathroom scenes. Avoid low contrast, blur, noise, overexposure, distorted glass, unreadable label, misspelled text, or extra text beyond the 3 overlays.

prompts.prompt: Design a clean, high-contrast square ecommerce thumbnail (1080x1080). Show ONLY the 'Bee Venom Bswell' clear glass jar (120g) with a minimal label reading exactly 'Bee Venom Bswell' (no logo), gold metallic lid. Place the jar slightly left-of-center, very large, ultra-sharp. Background: bright white with a diagonal honey-gold swoosh ribbon from top-right to bottom-left to create energy. On the right side, create a neat vertical stack of three minimal ingredient callout chips (no extra text inside chips): droplet icon (HA), collagen swirl icon, honeycomb/propolis icon; each chip in a small rounded square with subtle shadow. Add a faint glossy reflection under the jar for premium feel. Lighting: crisp studio, strong specular highlights, clean edges.

prompts.negative_prompt: No additional skincare items, no boxes, no droppers, no props like towels or flowers. No faces, no hands, no bees/insects. prompts.prompt: Create a premium skincare ecommerce thumbnail (1080x1080) featuring ONLY the product 'Bee Venom Bswell' in a clear glass jar (120g) with a minimal label reading exactly 'Bee Venom Bswell' (no logo) and a gold metallic lid.
